RecitationInstruction.ab: mazdaiiasnō aɱī...] zwt' W lʾspyk' BRA gwbšn' mazdaiiasnō ahmī 4000, 4010, 4020, 4040, 4045, 4161, 4162; zwt W lʾspyk mazdaiiasnō ahmaē 4030; zwt' (but Pers. supra: zot va rāsfi)mazdaiiasnō ahmū 4025; (Paz.) zōt̰ u rāspī mazdaiiasnō ahmī 4370, 4515.

mazdaiiasnō aɱī...] mazdaiiasnō ahmī mazdaiiasnō zaraϑuštriš OD OL Y āstūitiš 4025, 4040; mazdaiiasnō ahmī mazdaiiasnō zaraϑuštrəš frauuarāne āstīitasca OD OL Y āstiitiš 4050; mazdaiiasnō ahmī mazdaiiasnō zaraϑuštriš OD āstuuitiš 4210, 4240, 4280, 4515; mazdaiiasnō ahmī OD āstuuitiš 4200, 4370
